title: Notification Vibration Settings Not Working
content:
I get fb messages all the time and want my phone to not vibrate when I get them.

Recently got a Google Pixel 4a (5G).
Installed FB Msngr App.
Go to the "App Info" -> "Notifications" -> "Chats and Calls".

Now, there is 2 settings
- "default or silent" - > I have this set to Default because I don't want to turn off all the notification vibrations.
- "vibration" -> off.

Now, surely this should mean that vibrations are off. But it still continuously vibrates all the time. I don't *think* this is related to the App itself.

Could someone please direct me to how to solve this. Thanks.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
